content.raw: the problem was mainly this line `gui::set_world(this->node->GetTopicNamespace());` which got moved later to the `MainWindow::Load` function. `MainWindow` creates `RenderWidget` in the constructor which in turn [creates](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/f664c02e831bb6071ab15d5aaa551e7c42b92105/gazebo/gui/RenderWidget.cc?at=gzclient_black_screen_2.2#cl-86) the `Scene`. So the gui name wasn't set (remains `default`) before being passed through the `Scene` 's constructor. So `Scene` will always [initialize](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/f664c02e831bb6071ab15d5aaa551e7c42b92105/gazebo/rendering/Scene.cc#cl-102) it's node to the `default` namespace.
content.html: the problem was mainly this line gui::set_world(this->node->GetTopicNamespace()); which got moved later to the MainWindow::Load function. MainWindow creates RenderWidget in the constructor which in turn creates the Scene. So the gui name wasn't set (remains default) before being passed through the Scene 's constructor. So Scene will always initialize it's node to the default namespace.
